text:
Hi!

I would love if jmeter would either remember the last file open location throughout restarts or if you could define a default location for the file dialogue to use.

Reason: currently this always defaults to the "bin" directory of jmeter which is not where I keep my test cases -> always have to browse to the correct folder :(

br and thanks for considering,
Immanuel

Default location can be set by adding to system.properties:
user.dir=FOLDER YOU WANT to use
